text: junim-eul ttaleuneunja bog-eul bad-eul geos-iyo geubun-eul ttaleuji anhneunja jisang-ui modeun geos-i geuui geos-ila hal jilado geugeos-eulo joeag-e daehan sog joega doeji moshalila geudeul-egeneun joeag-e daehan bosang-i iss-eul geos-imyeo geudeul-ui jugeojineun saaghan hyusigcheoin jiog ppun-ila
